raw_text: Skip to content Issue 124 – January 2017 Cover Art Waste Pickers Gabriel Bjork Stiernstrom is a concept artist and illustrator from Gothenburg, Sweden. His main focus is concept design for games and films but he has also done book covers, matte paintings, and promotional artwork. ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Skip to content
Issue 124 – January 2017
Cover Art
Waste Pickers
Gabriel Bjork Stiernstrom is a concept artist and illustrator from Gothenburg, Sweden. His main focus is concept design for games and films but he has also done book covers, matte paintings, and promotional artwork.
ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
